info.description:
API definition for PDS

 | API Documentation |
 |-----|
  |[Personal Demographics Service - FHIR API](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/api-catalogue/personal-demographics-service-fhir)|


 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[ukcore.release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/hl7fhirukcorer4release1/home)||
 |[uk.nhsdigital.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)||

tags.name: Patient
tags.description:
Profile : [NHSDigital-Patient](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-Patient.guide.md) (additional rules to the resource) 
 Resource type: [Patient](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/Patient.html) (also contains links to code generations schemas)

tags.name: RelatedPerson
tags.description:
Profile : [UKCore-RelatedPerson](https://simplifier.net/guide/HL7FHIRUKCoreR4Release1/Home/ProfilesandExtensions/ProfileUKCore-RelatedPerson) (additional rules to the resource) 
 Resource type: [RelatedPerson](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/RelatedPerson.html) (also contains links to code generations schemas)

get.summary: server-capabilities: Fetch the server FHIR CapabilityStatement

patch.summary: instance-patch: Patch a resource instance of type Patient by ID

application/fhir+xml.example:
<Parameters xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
   <parameter>
      <name value="operation"></name>
      <part>
         <name value="type"></name>
         <valueString value="add"></valueString>
      </part>
      <part>
         <name value="path"></name>
         <valueString value="Patient"></valueString>
      </part>
      <part>
         <name value="name"></name>
         <valueString value="birthDate"></valueString>
      </part>
      <part>
         <name value="value"></name>
         <valueDate value="1930-01-01"></valueDate>
      </part>
   </parameter>
</Parameters>

parameters.name: family
parameters.description:
The patient's family name (surname). Multiple Resources:

* [Patient](patient.html): A portion of the family name of the patient
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A portion of the family name | Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [string ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#string)| Patient.name.family | Practitioner.name.family |

parameters.name: given
parameters.description:
A portion of the given name of the patient Multiple Resources:

* [Patient](patient.html): A portion of the given name of the patient
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A portion of the given name | Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [string ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#string)| Patient.name.given | Practitioner.name.given |

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description:
Gender of the patient Multiple Resources:

* [Patient](patient.html): Gender of the patient
* [Person](person.html): The gender of the person
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): Gender of the practitioner
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): Gender of the related person | Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)| Patient.gender | Person.gender | Practitioner.gender | RelatedPerson.gender |

parameters.name: birthdate
parameters.description:
The patient's date of birth Multiple Resources:

* [Patient](patient.html): The patient's date of birth
* [Person](person.html): The person's date of birth
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): The Related Person's date of birth | Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [date/datetime ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#date/datetime)| Patient.birthDate | Person.birthDate | RelatedPerson.birthDate |

parameters.name: death-date
parameters.description:
The date of death has been provided and satisfies this search value The date of death has been provided and satisfies this search value

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [date/datetime ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#date/datetime)|  (Patient.deceased as dateTime) |

parameters.name: address-postcode
parameters.description:
A postalCode specified in an address

 Caution: This does not appear to be a valid search parameter. **Please check Hl7 FHIR conformance.**

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description:
Correction to actual PDS API. A postalCode specified in an address Multiple Resources:

* [Patient](patient.html): A postalCode specified in an address
* [Person](person.html): A postal code specified in an address
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A postalCode specified in an address
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A postal code specified in an address | Type | Expression | |--------|--------| | [string ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#string)| Patient.address.postalCode | Person.address.postalCode | Practitioner.address.postalCode | RelatedPerson.address.postalCode |

parameters.name: general-practitioner:identifier
parameters.description:
Correction to PDS API. Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  Patient.generalPractitioner.identifier | Patient.generalPractitioner.where(resolve() is Resource).identifier |

parameters.name: general-practitioner
parameters.description:
Correction to PDS API. Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  Patient.generalPractitioner |

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description:
Patients NHS Number The patient this related person is related to

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  RelatedPerson.patient |

CapabilityStatement.description: See resource [CapabilityStatement](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/CapabilityStatement.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

Patient.description: See [NHSDigital-Patient](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-Patient.guide.md) for the FHIR Profile on resource [Patient](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/Patient.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

OperationOutcome.description: See resource [OperationOutcome](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/OperationOutcome.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)

RelatedPerson.description: See [UKCore-RelatedPerson](https://simplifier.net/guide/HL7FHIRUKCoreR4Release1/Home/ProfilesandExtensions/ProfileUKCore-RelatedPerson) for the FHIR Profile on resource [RelatedPerson](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/RelatedPerson.html). HL7 FHIR R4 Schema can be found here [HL7 FHIR Downloads](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/downloads.html)
